definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: I read instalments of the story in the newspaper last year.
sentences.chinese: 我去年在报纸上读过这故事的分期连载。

sentences.english: Amateurs were posting poems, short stories and serialized novels.
sentences.chinese: 业余者都是发表些诗，短片故事和连载小说。

sentences.english: He started a magazine serial about a scientific detective.
sentences.chinese: 他开始着杂志上一篇科学侦探的连载小说。

sentences.english: The book was serialized in People's Literature, a magazine co-founded by Mao.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是人民日报的连载，毛事其中的合伙创办人。

sentences.english: The highest and the autumn people will become a full-time cartoonist, started the comic strip?
sentences.chinese: 最高和秋人能成为专职漫画家，开始连载漫画吗？

sentences.english: His novels are still serialized there.
sentences.chinese: 他的小说仍在那儿连载。

sentences.english: In this installment, we dig into the nature of our unemployment crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在这个连载里，我们会深入挖掘失业危机的本质。

sentences.english: The author is a Japanese manga artist Gosho Aoyama reasoning is still serialized in the.
sentences.chinese: 作者为日本推理漫画家青山刚昌，目前仍在连载中。

sentences.english: It is a serial comic in a monthly comic magazine.
sentences.chinese: 这个漫画版是以月刊的方式连载中。

sentences.english: On Friday night he finished the serial, twenty-one thousand words long.
sentences.chinese: 星期五晚上他写完了连载故事，二万一千字。

sentences.english: This story is published in installments.
The author is a Japanese manga artist Gosho Aoyama reasoning, is still serialized in.
sentences.chinese: 作者为日本推理漫画家青山刚昌，目前仍在连载中。

sentences.english: An exciting new serial story will begin in our next week?s issue.
sentences.chinese: 一个刺激而新颖的连载故事将于下周开始在本刊登出。

sentences.english: I had been so enthralled by reading the serial stories in the magazine supplement.
sentences.chinese: 我一直迷恋着阅读杂志增刊上的连载小说。

sentences.english: Contents of this article were once serialised in the newspaper Constuction Times.
sentences.chinese: 该文的内容曾在《建筑时报》连载。

sentences.english: After breakfast he went on with his serial.
sentences.chinese: 早饭之后他继续写他的连载故事。

definition: to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
